vote.title: Authorize a sixty-two month lease agreement with Ricchi Towers, LLC, for approximately 2,105 square feet of office space located at 8585 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite S-720, to be used for City personnel purposes for the Dallas Fire Department for the period July 1, 2022 through August 31, 2027 - Not to exceed $190,151.68 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
